verses.text: 所以，你們在基督裡若有甚麼鼓勵，有甚麼愛心的安慰，有甚麼靈裡的契通，有甚麼慈悲和憐憫，

words.note: Often combined with 在 to mean 'in' or 'among'.
Lit. 'loving heart'.
Used here to mean 'in the Spirit' or 'spiritually'.
Specifically refers to spiritual fellowship or communion.
Often used in religious contexts, implying divine compassion.
Often paired with 慈悲 in biblical texts.

verses.text: 就應當有同樣的思想，同樣的愛心，要心志相同，思想一致，使我充滿喜樂。

words.note: Refers to one's resolve or inclination.
Often used in biblical contexts to express spiritual joy.

verses.text: 不要自私自利，也不要貪圖虛榮，只要謙卑，看別人比自己強；

words.note: An idiom emphasizing selfishness.
Functions as a verb here, 'be humble'.

verses.text: 各人不要單顧自己的事，也要顧別人的事。
你們應當有這樣的思想，這也是基督耶穌的思想。（全節或譯：「你們當以基督耶穌的心為心。」）
他本來有 神的形象，卻不堅持自己與 神平等的地位，

words.note: The raised dot indicates reverence for God in Chinese Bibles.

verses.text: 反而倒空自己，取了奴僕的形象，成為人的樣式；

words.note: Lit. 'pour empty'; contextually means 'humble oneself'.

verses.text: 既然有人的樣子，就自甘卑微，順服至死，而且死在十字架上。

words.note: A theological phrase describing self-humiliation.

words.definition: to the point of death, even to death

words.note: Literally 'ten-character frame', referring to its shape.

verses.text: 因此 神把他升為至高，並且賜給他超過萬名之上的名。

words.note: Lit. 'ten thousand names'; refers to all other names.

verses.text: 使天上、地上和地底下的一切，因著耶穌的名，都要屈膝，
並且口裡承認耶穌基督為主，使榮耀歸給父 神。

words.note: Refers to God or Christ in a religious context.
Often refers to divine glory.
Refers to God the Father.

verses.text: 這樣看來，我所親愛的，你們素來是順服的，（不但我在你們那裡的時候是這樣，現今我不在，你們更要順服，）就應當恐懼戰兢地作成自己的救恩。

words.note: A common term of address in epistles.
A set biblical phrase for reverence and awe.
Divine act of saving from sin.

verses.heading: Lights in the World

verses.text: 神為了成全自己的美意，就在你們裡面動工，使你們可以立志和行事。

words.note: Often used in the context of God's purpose or work.
Refers to God's benevolent plan.
In this context, refers to God's work in believers.

verses.text: 無論作甚麼，都不要發怨言、起爭論，
好使你們無可指摘、純真無邪，在這彎曲乖謬的世代中，作 神沒有瑕疵的兒女；你們要在這世代中發光，好像天上的光體一樣，

words.note: A set phrase emphasizing moral purity.
Describes moral uprightness and simplicity.
Used metaphorically for moral deviation.
Often paired with 彎曲 in scripture to describe a wicked generation.
Refers to a specific period or group of people, often with moral connotations.
Used metaphorically for moral fault or imperfection.
Often refers to 'children of God' in scripture.
Refers to a specific period or group of people, often with moral connotations.
Metaphorical for exhibiting righteousness or spiritual truth.
Refers to the celestial realm or divine origin.
Refers to celestial bodies like stars or lamps.

verses.text: 把生命的道顯揚出來，使我在基督的日子可以誇耀我沒有空跑，也沒有徒勞。

words.note: Often refers to 'the Word' or 'the Way' in scripture.

verses.text: 即使把我澆奠在你們信心的祭物和供奉上，我也喜樂，並且和你們大家一同喜樂。

words.note: Refers to a drink offering or libation sacrifice.

verses.text: 照樣，你們也要喜樂，並且要和我一同喜樂。
我靠著主耶穌，希望不久就會差提摩太到你們那裡去，使我們知道你們的情況，可以得到鼓勵。
verses.heading: Models for Ministry

verses.text: 沒有人與我同心，真正關心你們的事，
因為大家只顧自己的事，而不理耶穌基督的事。
不過，你們知道提摩太已經證明了他的為人，他和我一同為了福音服事主，就像兒子跟父親一樣。

words.note: Lit. 'blessed news'

verses.text: 所以，等我看出自己的事會怎樣了結之後，我希望立刻差他去；
而且靠著主，我相信自己不久也會去。
然而我認為必須差以巴弗提到你們那裡去，他是我的弟兄，與我一同作工一同作戰的，也是你們為我的需要差來服事我的。

words.note: Often means 'brother in faith' in biblical context.

verses.text: 他一直在想念你們眾人，並且因為你們聽見他病了，他就非常難過。

words.note: Lit. 'not ordinary'

verses.text: 事實上他病得幾乎要死，然而 神憐憫了他；不但憐憫他，也憐憫我，免得我憂上加憂。

words.note: Idiomatic expression meaning 'to add sorrow to sorrow'.

verses.text: 所以，我更急著差他去，讓你們再見到他，就可以喜樂，也可以減少我的掛慮。
因此，你們要在主裡歡歡喜喜地接待他，也要尊重這樣的人，

words.note: A reduplicated adverbial form indicating intense joy.

verses.text: 因他為了基督的工作，冒著生命的危險，差一點喪了命，為的是要補滿你們服事我不足的地方。

words.definition: for the sake of, in order to

words.note: A fixed verb-object phrase indicating loss of life.

words.definition: to want to, be going to

words.note: Can mean 'place' literally or 'aspect/area' figuratively.
